verses.verse: If <WG1487> there is therefore<WG3767> any<WG5100> exhortation<WG3874> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>, if<WG1487> any<WG5100> consolation<WG3890> of love<WG26>, if<WG1487> any<WG5100> fellowship<WG2842> of the Spirit<WG4151>, if<WG1487> any<WG5100> tender mercies<WG4698> and<WG2532> compassions<WG3628>,

make full<WG4137> my<WG3450> joy<WG5479>, that<WG2443> ye be<WG5426> of the same<WG846> mind<WG5426>, having<WG2192> the<WG26> same<WG846> love<WG26>, being of one accord<WG4861>, of<WG5426> one<WG1520> mind<WG5426>;

doing nothing<WG3367> through<WG2596> faction<WG2052> or<WG2228> through vainglory<WG2754>, but<WG235> in lowliness of mind5012, 2233 each<WG240> counting<WG2233> other<WG240> better<WG5242> than himself<WG1438>;
not <WG3361> looking<WG4648> each<WG1538> of you to his own things<WG1438>, but<WG235> each<WG1538> of you also<WG2532> to the things of others<WG2087>.
Have <WG1063> this5124, 5426 mind in<WG1722> you<WG5213>, which was<WG3739> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>:
who <WG3739>, existing<WG5225> in<WG1722> the form<WG3444> of God<WG2316>, counted not<WG3756> the being<WG5225> on an equality<WG2470> with God<WG2316> a thing to be<WG1511> grasped<WG725>,
but235, 2758 emptied<WG2758> himself<WG1438>, taking<WG2983> the form<WG3444> of a servant<WG1401>, being made<WG1096> in<WG1722> the likeness<WG3667> of men<WG444>;

and <WG2532> being found<WG2147> in fashion<WG4976> as<WG5613> a man<WG444>, he humbled<WG5013> himself<WG1438>, becoming<WG1096> obedient<WG5255> even<WG1161> unto<WG3360> death<WG2288>, yea<WG2288>, the death of the cross<WG4716>.
Wherefore <WG1352> also<WG2532> God<WG2316> highly exalted<WG5251> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> gave<WG5483> unto him<WG846> the name<WG3686> which is<WG3588> above<WG5228> every<WG3956> name<WG3686>;

that <WG2443> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of Jesus<WG2424> every<WG3956> knee<WG1119> should bow<WG2578>, of<WG2032> things in heaven<WG2032> and<WG2532> things on earth<WG1919> and<WG2532> things under the earth<WG2709>,
and <WG2532> that every<WG3956> tongue<WG1100> should confess<WG1843> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> is Lord<WG2962>, to<WG1519> the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962>.

So <WG5620> then<WG3450>, my beloved<WG27>, even as<WG2531> ye have<WG5219> always<WG3842> obeyed<WG5219>, not<WG3361> as<WG5613> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> presence<WG3952> only<WG3440>, but<WG235> now<WG3568> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> absence<WG666>, work out<WG2716> your own<WG1438> salvation<WG4991> with<WG3326> fear<WG5401> and<WG2532> trembling<WG5156>;
for <WG1063> it is<WG2076> God<WG2316> who<WG3588> worketh<WG1754> in<WG1722> you<WG5213> both<WG2532> to will<WG2309> and<WG2532> to work<WG1754>, for<WG5228> his good pleasure<WG2107>.
Do <WG4160> all things<WG3956> without<WG5565> murmurings<WG1112> and<WG2532> questionings<WG1261>:

that <WG2443> ye may become<WG1096> blameless<WG273> and<WG2532> harmless<WG185>, children<WG5043> of God<WG2316> without blemish<WG298> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of a<WG1074> crooked<WG4646> and<WG2532> perverse<WG1294> generation<WG1074>, among<WG1722> whom<WG3739> ye are seen<WG5316> as<WG5613> lights<WG5458> in<WG1722> the world<WG2889>,

holding forth<WG1907> the word<WG3056> of life<WG2222>; that<WG1519> I<WG1698> may have whereof to glory<WG2745> in<WG1519> the day<WG2250> of Christ<WG5547>, that<WG3754> I did<WG5143> not<WG3756> run<WG5143> in<WG1519> vain<WG2756> neither<WG3761> labor<WG2872> in<WG1519> vain<WG2756>.

Yea <WG235>, and<WG2532> if<WG1487> I am offered<WG4689> upon<WG1909> the sacrifice<WG2378> and<WG2532> service<WG3009> of<WG4102> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102>, I joy<WG5463>, and<WG2532> rejoice<WG4796> with you<WG5213> all<WG3956>:
and <WG1161> in the same manner<WG846> do<WG5463> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> joy<WG5463>, and<WG2532> rejoice with<WG4796> me<WG3427>.

But <WG1161> I hope<WG1679> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> to send<WG3992> Timothy<WG5095> shortly<WG5030> unto you<WG5213>, that<WG2443> I also<WG2504> may be of good comfort<WG2174>, when I know<WG1097> your<WG5216> state<WG4012>.
For <WG1063> I have<WG2192> no man<WG3762> likeminded<WG2473>, who<WG3748> will<WG3309> care truly<WG1104> for<WG3309> your<WG5216> state<WG4012>.
For <WG1063> they all<WG3956> seek<WG2212> their own<WG1438>, not<WG3756> the things of<WG3588> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.

But <WG1161> ye know<WG1097> the proof<WG1382> of him<WG846>, that<WG3754>, as<WG5613> a child<WG5043> serveth a father<WG3962>, so he served<WG1398> with<WG4862> me<WG1698> in<WG1519> furtherance of the gospel<WG2098>.
Him5126, Ezekiel3 therefore<WG3767> I hope<WG1679> to send<WG3992> forthwith<WG1824>, so soon as<WG5613> I shall see<WG872> how<WG302> it will go with me<WG1691>:
but <WG1161> I trust<WG3982> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> that<WG3754> I<WG2064> myself<WG846> also<WG2532> shall come<WG2064> shortly<WG5030>.

But <WG1161> I counted it<WG2233> necessary<WG316> to send<WG3992> to<WG4314> you<WG5209> Epaphroditus<WG1891>, my<WG3450> brother<WG80> and<WG2532> fellow-worker<WG4904> and<WG2532> fellow-soldier<WG4961>, and<WG2532> your<WG5216> messenger<WG652> and<WG2532> minister<WG3011> to<WG5532> my<WG3450> need<WG5532>;
since <WG1894> he<WG2258> longed after<WG1971> you<WG5209> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> was sore troubled<WG85>, because<WG1360> ye had heard<WG191> that<WG1360> he was sick<WG770>:

for <WG1063> indeed<WG2532> he was sick<WG770> nigh unto<WG3897> death<WG2288>: but<WG235> God<WG2316> had mercy on<WG1653> him<WG846>; and<WG1161> not<WG3756> on<WG1653> him<WG846> only<WG3440>, but<WG235> on me<WG1691> also<WG2443>, that I might not have<WG2192> sorrow<WG3077> upon<WG1909> sorrow<WG3077>.

I have sent<WG3992> him<WG846> therefore<WG3767> the more diligently<WG4708>, that<WG2443>, when ye see<WG1492> him<WG846> again<WG3825>, ye may rejoice<WG5463>, and that I<WG2504> may be<WG5600> the less sorrowful<WG253>.
Receive <WG4327> him<WG846> therefore<WG3767> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> with<WG3326> all<WG3956> joy<WG5479>; and<WG2532> hold<WG2192> such<WG5108> in honor<WG1784>:

because <WG3754> for<WG1223> the work<WG2041> of Christ<WG5547> he came nigh<WG1448> unto<WG3360> death<WG2288>, hazarding<WG3851> his life<WG2443> to supply<WG378> that which was lacking<WG5303> in your<WG5216> service<WG3009> toward<WG4314> me<WG3165>.
